discourse_list.title: EOFv2 aka what "EVM 2.0" could look like

content.content: We have been thinking about the a number of proposals which have been made for EOF (most notable around account introspection) and summarised our thoughts in this document:   HackMD   EOFv2 - HackMD # EOFv2  [toc]  ## Background  The EVM Object Format (EOF) was proposed as a number of separate EIPs      This gives our view on the roadmap of EOF (v1, and v2 – the final boss ).
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the EVM Object Format (EOF) proposal and provides a summary of the author's thoughts on the roadmap of EOF, including version 1 and version 2. The post does not advertise the proposal, ask for collaboration, or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
